short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manually create new Intercom lead accounts from your browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension uses OAuth on the client side to get an Access Token for your Intercom workspace. The extension then stores the Access Token in Chrome's local storage and provides you with an interface to create leads using the token.

Checkout the GitHub repo for this extension to get a better idea of how it works:
https://github.com/alamarcpsc/intercom-lead-creator
